We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private MidPoint _midpoint;
// In Initialize()
_midpoint = MIDPOINT(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_midpoint.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "MIDPOINT Is Ready", _midpoint.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MIDPOINT Warm Up Period", _midpoint.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MIDPOINT Current", _midpoint.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MIDPOINT Name", _midpoint.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MIDPOINT Samples", _midpoint.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.midpoint = self.MIDPOINT(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.midpoint.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MIDPOINT Is Ready", self.midpoint.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MIDPOINT Warm Up Period", self.midpoint.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MIDPOINT Current", self.midpoint.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MIDPOINT Name", self.midpoint.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MIDPOINT Samples", self.midpoint.Samples);
}
